title: Letter CXLVI. To Anatolius, Bishop of Constantinople.

paragraphs.text: Letter CXLVI. To Anatolius, Bishop of Constantinople.
(Begging him to take precautions lest the change of Emperor should be made the occasion for fresh outbreaks of heresy.)Letter CXLVII. TO Julian, Bishop OF Cos, And Aetius, The Presbyter.
(Charging him to uphold the acts of Chalcedon, and to help in choosing a good successor to Proterius.)
